titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that the current Federal income tax deduction for interest paid on debt secured by a first or second home should not be further restricted.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/3/2013--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that the current federal income tax deduction for mortgage interest paid on a first or second home should not be further restricted.
